page.title: 19CHILDREN'S HOBBIES
page.content: One of my hobbies is{sailing}.We sail on the Avon at Chippenham, zigzagging up and down.The instructor shows you how to rig and sail a boat. The club owns 10 boats and the members own a lot more. They are mostly made of wood.I'm normally allowed to steer but it's not easy on the river and last time I ran aground.It's easier at sea! I collect stamps , being a member of the{"Stamp Bug Club}.It doesn't have a headquarters but they send a magazine every other month and if you show your membership card you can get in places free.If you send off for new stamps they send them on the first day. I'm only 11 but I play{Golf}using my Dad's old set of clubs at Westonbirt Golf Club where we have to go round twice becuase there are only 9 holes. Sometimes we play with people we haven't met before so making friends.
